DataElement.preferredName: eCigarette Or Vapor Stop Use Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which a person quit using electronic cigarettes (eCigarettes) or vapors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Electronic Cigarette Or Vapor Stop Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A battery-powered atomizer designed to aerosolize a liquid solution for inhalation._Put an end to a state or an activity._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A battery-powered atomizer designed to aerosolize a liquid solution for inhalation.

Concepts.definition: A battery-powered electronic device designed to atomize a nicotine-containing liquid solution for inhalation in a manner that simulates smoking a tobacco cigarette.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
